mapper.insert: insert into ground (lecture_id, title, information, level, max_capacity, deposit, start_at, end_at, mission_fail_limit) values (#{lectureId}, #{title}, #{information}, #{level}, #{maxCapacity}, #{deposit}, #{startAt}, #{endAt}, #{missionFailLimit})

insert into mission(ground_id, assignment, start_at, end_at) values
( (SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()), #{item.assignment}, #{item.startAt}, #{item.endAt})
mapper.update: update user set point = point + (select deposit from ground where id=#{groundId}) where id in (select user_id from user_ground where ground_id=#{groundId})
update user_ground set is_attending = 0 where user_id in (select user_id from user_ground where ground_id=#{groundId}) and ground_id = #{ground_id}
